Radiant Rush.name: Radiant Rush
Radiant Rush.flavor: You blur into action, speeding across the battlefield to smash into your enemy in a halo of radiance. If your blow misses, the light conceals you.
Radiant Rush.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, you push the target 2 squares, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Radiant Rush.onMiss: You gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
Radiant Rush.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Wings of Angels.name: Wings of Angels
Wings of Angels.flavor: Your lower body fades into swirling mist as you gain mastery of your airborne movement.
Wings of Angels.effect: Until the stance ends, your fly speed increases by 4, and you can hover. In addition, while you arenâ€™t bloodied, you gain regeneration equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Celestial Skirmish.name: Celestial Skirmish
Celestial Skirmish.flavor: You take to the sky, your weapon aglow. You swoop and strike repeatedly as you dart past your foes.
Celestial Skirmish.effect: You fly your speed + 2. During this movement, you gain a +6 bonus to AC against opportunity attacks. At any point during the movement, you can make the following attack three times, each time against a different target.
Celestial Skirmish.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier radiant damage. If you hit two creatures, the second is dazed (save ends). If you hit three creatures, the third is stunned (save ends).
